page.title: 13TRADE
page.content: There have been in the past scattered shops,at Meopham Green,Red Street and Luddesdown,but these have closed down."Ye Little Shoppe"is open all hours near Sole Street Station.It stocks a wide range of goods but has little trade.There is further trade at the three petrol stations and the many public houses. There are two groups of shops,one consists of five older properties,near the station.There is an estate agency,an off license,a small busy grocers and a baker who bakes and delivers his own bread. The second group is larger and more modern.
